title: Inflation rate in Costa Rica 2024
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, containing a total of 41 data points.
In general Inflation rate compared to previous year has fallen over the Year.
Inflation rate compared to previous year is roughly constant from 1984 to 2016, gradually increasing from 2016 to 2017, and finally roughly constant from 2017 to 2024.
Maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year, about 28.67 was reported at Year 1991
Minimum Inflation rate compared to previous year about 0.02 was reached at Year 2016

max_summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Inflation rate compared to previous year. In total the number of data points it has is 41.
Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has decreased over the Year.
Inflation rate compared to previous year is roughly constant from 1984 to 2016, gradually increasing from 2016 to 2017, and finally roughly constant from 2017 to 2024.
Maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year, about 28.67 was reported at Year 1991
Minimum Inflation rate compared to previous year about 0.02 was reached at Year 2016

The line drastically remained stable by 1.7 times from Year 1994 to 1995,remained stable by 5.6 times from Year 2014 to 2015,remained stable by 40.0 times from Year 2015 to 2016, and lastly, increased by 81.5 times from Year 2016 to 2017.
